summary: This is the More Taverns and Inns mod for skyrim. it adds more Taverns/Inns to the game and is very handy if you are roaming through the world of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds more Taverns and Inns to the world of skyrim. this mod has been on the page 3 of the most popular mods on the steam workshop and is created by me (dav1dar1). you can choose which tavern you wish to add to your game. for now only 1 tavern will be added to the game. this mod will become very handy if you use the: Realistic Needs and Diseases Mod. Enjoy!! (p.s: i had some mods still activated. the: \"i would like some water\" and \"i would like to perform here\" option aren\'t in this mod srry for any misunderstandings)

IMPORTANT: i know already that you want more taverns, even though i uploaded it on 12:13 5-20-2013.
but i will be working a lot on the taverns. although i still have school to work on. and i am working as hard as i can to make it this year. so i hope you guys understand that i will work on the taverns if i have spare time. and thank you for the nice comments you have been sending the past 2 hours. this is Davidari. Enjoy the mod!
author: Dav1dar1

files.name: The More Taverns and Inns Mod
